MonsterTrait.Name: Immutable Form
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork hound is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork hound has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Diligent Tracker
MonsterTrait.Text: Clockwork hounds are designed to guard areas and track prey. They have advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks when tracking.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tripping Tongue
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MonsterTrait.Name: Explosive Core
MonsterTrait.Text: The mechanism that powers the hound explodes when the construct is destroyed. All creatures within 5 feet of the hound take 7 (2d6) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.
